https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/usSEwgyRmAm2lLTWVNXJjevQvg1.jpg "Seven Days in Heaven" covers the 7 days of the Taoist morning ritual after the death of Lin Guo Yuan (Po Tai). The movie examines the effects of his death on his children, nephew, and sister-in-law ... 7 Days in Heaven
